description: Here you can manage system settings of your router
factoryWarning: You are about to factory reset the device. This will irreversibly delete all data.
firmwareUpgradeExplanation: Please choose a compatible firmware .bin file. You will be able to confirm the hash found before doing the upgrade
restartWarning: You are about to restart your router. This will mean your network might be unavailable for a few minutes.
timezoneExplanation: Please select the Timezone that you are located in
title: System
